T02D2895:246b-1: a'arya badzra p'a ni n'i l'am ba ra dha ra s'a dha na tsinta ma ni n'a ma /
T02D2895:246b-3: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can
T02D2895:246b-4: gyi sgrub pa'i thabs yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes
T02D2895:246b-5: bya ba / dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2895:246b-6: re zhig dang po rnal 'byor pas shing gcig la
T02D2895:246b-7: sogs pa'i sa phyogs su stan 'jam pa la 'dug
T02D2895:246b-8: ste / rang gi snying ga'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2895:246b-9: la gnas pa'i h'um nag po bsams nas de'i 'od
T02D2895:246b-10: zer gyis nam mkha' la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2895:246b-11: pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bltas te /
T02D2895:246b-12: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod cing sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2895:247a-0: btang snyoms zhes bya ba tshad med pa tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsams la / gcig @247a * //
T02D2895:247a-1: dang du ma dang bral bas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa dang /
T02D2895:247a-2: bdag nyid kyang stong par bsams la tho rangs kyi
T02D2895:247a-3: skar ma dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mi dmigs shing
T02D2895:247a-4: / aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a
T02D2895:247a-5: wa a'atma konya\ham zhes bya bas ni brtan par bya'o
T02D2895:247a-6: / // de nas yi ge bam las byung ba'i
T02D2895:247a-7: padma nag po'i lte bar yi ge h'um las byung
T02D2895:247a-8: ba'i padma nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su h'um
T02D2895:247a-9: kha dog nag po dang ring ba'i sprin sgra'i yi
T02D2895:247a-11: de yongs su gyur pa las khro bo'i rdo rje
T02D2895:247a-12: rtse lnga pa bsam zhing de'i 'od zer gyis nam
T02D2895:247a-13: mkha' la khro bo'i rigs kun bkug la de nyid
T02D2895:247a-14: gzhug ste / de yongs su gyur pa las bcom
T02D2895:247a-15: ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can
T02D2895:247a-16: sku mdog nag po sprin lta bu /
T02D2895:247a-22: dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D2895:247a-23: ral ba'i cod pan gyi dbus na mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon pos brgyan pa /
T02D2895:247a-25: phyag g-yas pas rdo rje phyar te gnas pa /
T02D2895:247a-26: phyag g-yon pa khro bo'i khu tshur gyis gdug pa gnon pa'i sdigs mdzub 'chang ba /
T02D2895:247a-27: rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um nag po dang ldan pa /
T02D2895:247a-28: gos sngon po'i ga sha dang /
T02D2895:247a-30: rigs kyi klu brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2895:247a-31: phyag gnyis la 'jog po dang rigs ldan dmar po /
T02D2895:247a-32: zhabs gnyis la mtha' yas dang nor rgyas kyi bu nag po /
T02D2895:247a-33: snyan gnyis la padma dang padma chen po ser po /
T02D2895:247a-34: ska rags su bcings pa ni dung skyong dkar po /
T02D2895:247a-35: ral pa gcig pa'i srad bu ni hu lunta ljang gu 'dzin pa /
T02D2895:247a-38: khyab 'jug la sogs pa mu stegs pa'i lha'i gzhung dang gzugs 'joms par mdzad par bsams la /
T02D2895:247a-39: de dang 'dra ba'i gos sngon po can mdun du
T02D2895:247a-40: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhugs par bsams
T02D2895:247a-41: la rang gi snying gnas spros pa'i mchod pa'i lha
T02D2895:247a-43: dza:h'um bam ho: zhes pa'i sngags kyis dgug pa dang /
T02D2895:247a-47: tha mi dad par bya ba'o //
T02D2895:247a-48: de nas lce la yi ge h'um las rdo rje
T02D2895:247a-49: rtse lnga pa de nyid kyis mtshan par bsams la
T02D2895:247b-0: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs @247b ka na yang rdo
T02D2895:247b-1: rje rtse lnga pa h'um gis mtshan pa bsams te
T02D2895:247b-2: / mig la sogs pa'i dbang po drug la yang
T02D2895:247b-3: yi ge h'um drug yongs su gyur pa las de
T02D2895:247b-4: dang 'dra ba'i gos sngon po can drug bkod de
T02D2895:247b-5: / / yi ge gsum gyis sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2895:247b-6: ru dr'a ksha'i phreng ba la bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2895:247b-7: aom n'i l'am bar dha ra badzra p'a ni h'um h'um phat /
T02D2895:247b-8: snying po'i sngags 'di yi ge bcu gsum pa'o //
T02D2895:247b-9: aom badzra p'a ni h'um h'um phat /
T02D2895:247b-10: nye ba'i snying po yi ge bdun pa'o //
T02D2895:247b-11: de dag la yang sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag
T02D2895:247b-12: gcig bzlas na drag po'i las 'grub par 'gyur ro
T02D2895:247b-13: // de nas gsad pa'i las ni dur khrod du phyin la /
T02D2895:247b-14: me thab gru gsum bcas la bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes kyi sa dang /
T02D2895:247b-15: dur khrod kyi thal ba dang /
T02D2895:247b-19: dug la bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
T02D2895:247b-20: bcad cing bsregs na zhag bdun na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2895:247b-21: h'um dang phat spangs pa'i sbyor ba de nyid kyis
T02D2895:247b-22: mngar gsum sv'a h'a'i mtha' can gyis bsregs na zhi
T02D2895:247b-23: bar 'gyur ro // rgyas pa la ni aom gyi mtha' can gyis so //
T02D2895:247b-24: dbang la ho:'i mtha' can gyis so //
T02D2895:247b-25: dgug pa la ni dza:'i mtha' can gyis so //
T02D2895:247b-26: bdud rtsi lngas ni las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2895:247b-27: de nas aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'a dya nutpanna tv'a ta ces pa'am /
T02D2895:247b-28: snying po'am nye ba'i snying pos gtor ma gtang bar bya'o //
T02D2895:247b-29: gtor ma gtang ba'i rdzas ni bza' ba dang /
T02D2895:247b-34: myos pa dang ldan pa sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2895:247b-35: ldang ba'i dus su ye shes sems dpa' kri to a'a:mu: zhes bya bas gshags su gsol ba dang /
T02D2895:247b-36: spyod lam bzhi de'i dang gis gnas par bya'o //
T02D2895:247b-37: phyag na rdo rje khro bo che //
T02D2895:247b-38: sgrub thabs gsal ba 'di byas pas //
T02D2895:247b-39: bsod nams gang zhig bsags pa des //
T02D2895:247b-40: sgrub pa'i las kun byed par shog /'phags pa phyag
T02D2895:247b-41: na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub pa'i
T02D2895:247b-42: thabs / yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba /
T02D2895:247b-43: slob dpon chen po dngos grub brnyes pa'i mkhas pa
T02D2895:247b-44: chen po nyin mdzad rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad
T02D2895:247b-45: pa'i phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi
